verses.roman:
nṛtyāveśe śrīnivāsa kichui nā jāne
bāra bāra ṭhele, teṅho krodha haila mane

synonyms: nṛtya-āveśe—fully absorbed in seeing the dancing of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrīnivāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; kichui—anything; nā—does not; jāne—know; bāra bāra—again and again; ṭhele—when he pushes; teṅho—Śrīvāsa; krodha—angry; haila—became; mane—in the mind.
translation: Absorbed in watching Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu dance, Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura could not understand why he was being touched and pushed. After he was pushed again and again, he became angry.
